Query:
SELECT
				 smdn.mdn,
			     s.FirstName,
			     s.LastName,
			     CASE
			     	WHEN s.Language = 0 THEN 'English'
			    	WHEN s.Language = 1 THEN 'Bahasa'
					ELSE 'Unknown'
			   	END,
			   	CASE
			    	WHEN s.status<=0 THEN 'Initialized'
			    	WHEN s.status<=1 THEN 'Active'
			    	WHEN s.status<=2 THEN 'PendingRetirement'
			    	WHEN s.status<=3 THEN 'Retired'
			    	WHEN s.status<=4 THEN 'Registered'
			    	WHEN s.status<=5 THEN 'Suspend'
			    	WHEN s.status<=6 THEN 'InActive'
			    	ELSE 'Non-Registered'
			   	END,
			   	CASE
			      	WHEN s.Restrictions=0 THEN 'None'
					WHEN s.Restrictions=1 THEN 'SelfSuspended'
			      	WHEN s.Restrictions=2 THEN 'Suspended'
			    	WHEN s.Restrictions=4 THEN 'SecurityLocked'
			    	WHEN s.Restrictions=8 THEN 'AbsoluteLocked'
			  	END,
			   	pt.Description,
			   	CASE
			    	WHEN p.status<=0 THEN 'Initialized'
			    	WHEN p.status<=1 THEN 'Active'
			    	WHEN p.status<=2 THEN 'PendingRetirement'
			    	ELSE 'Retired'
			   	END,
			   	smdn.IDType,
			    smdn.IDNumber,
			    DATE_FORMAT(s.DateOfBirth, '%Y-%m-%d'),
			    a.Line1,
			    a.Line2,
			    a.City,
			    a.State,
			    a.ZipCode,
			    p.CurrentBalance,
			    DATE_FORMAT(s.CreateTime, ${DateTimeFormat}),
			    DATE_FORMAT(s.LastUpdateTime, ${DateTimeFormat}),
				s.UpdatedBy     
			FROM
			     subscriber s INNER JOIN subscriber_mdn smdn ON s.ID = smdn.SubscriberID
			     LEFT OUTER JOIN address a ON s.SubscriberAddressID = a.ID
			     INNER JOIN pocket p ON smdn.ID = p.MDNID
			     INNER JOIN pocket_template pt ON p.PocketTemplateID = pt.ID
			WHERE
			     s.Type = 0
			     AND pt.Type in (1, 3)
			     AND p.IsDefault = 1
			     AND s.CreateTime < ${EndTime}
			     AND s.CreateTime >= ${StartTime}
			     AND s.status like  ${SubscriberStatus}
			     AND pt.ID like ${PocketTemplateID} 
			     AND s.Restrictions like ${SubscriberRestrictions}
